@Blm69420: I agree that the fantasy thing would have worked if she had been a single mom (even if that invites other questions). I mean, women with overactive imaginations are a sort of trope, but can only be used so much. For example, it's become a running gag with idolmaster's Otonashi Kotori and works because she's single and not seen very often (also because fan works use it most, both doujinshi and the novelm@s where she inserts herself into Lord of the Rings).
